name: Micro-Venture
description:
Oh no! Micro-Man has been kidnapped by (insert character we never see in the game)! Now, he needs to escape. Be his puppet master as you control him. You can beat the game, or constantly abuse him by killing him over and over again, do what pleases you.

Instructions - WASD or mouse to move. Touching the red or brown or whatever it is will result in starting the level over again. Touching the boss will result in death, and if you die you have to reset the page to start again
